name: clipscale
description:
=-=-=

clipscale is a random roguelike where you descend into an unknown dungeon.

conserve your ammo and your health, as the more you lose, the less you can see.

=-=-=

=-=-=

made in gamemaker studio 2.

graphics in aseprite.

music in bosca ceoil.

sound effects in bfxr.

font m3x6 by @managore.

=-=-=

created in 48 hours for #djam1.
